items.preText: Abir: "I kinda want BD's jersey to be the old school one in WC. The one that they beat Australia with, in 2005! Such a classic jersey. " - I love several of the classic jerseys for different teams
items.text: stopping on the pitch again, he goes back to this fuller ball and defends it into the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: stays in his crease again to a fullish ball, and taps it into the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: past the outside edge. He came forward to defend, but stayed inside the line. this one didn't turn, ended up going past the edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: slightly shorter, and he goes back to tuck it to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: tossed up more on middle stump, he comes forward to turn it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: taken by the keeper nice loop to the ball, changes his linen to outside off. Rovman is dragged forward to defend, but he's playing for turn that isn't there. At best the ball turned only gently, and takes his outside edge. Mushfiqur holds on, standing up to the stumps. Wait a minute, Rovman has reviewed this. Substitute Carlos Brathwaite has come on and is arguing with the umpires. The commentators on air saying it could be something to do with number of fielders inside the circle/outside it. Brathwaite is still in the middle and gesturing, standing alongside Hope and Powell. On the other side of the pitch the Bangladesh players are gathered. It ends in Brathwaite walking off, and Powell is walking back too. So he's definitely out.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, OUT

dismissal.text: R Powell c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 1 (9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 11.11

items.preText: In that last ball drama, it was lost just what a fantastic outing Mehidy had. He's been frugal and incisive
items.text: bullet straight drive full ball on the stumps, and Hope comes forward to drive it straight back. Sloppy work from long-on to let it through, but that shot deserved four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller ball, driven to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length, off-cutter, turned to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, punched to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.preText: Brathwaite was still at it off the field, animatedly talking to the fourth umpire
items.text: another off cutter from back of a length outside off. This time he waits for it and punches it through cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer to short third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.preText: dipayan: "Please enlighten us about that argument" - I'm fairly in the dark myself at this point. But will give out as more info becomes available
items.text: quicker one that drifts on the pads, blocked into the leg side
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, no run

items.text: on a length, he comes forward to tap it to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, and turning into the batsman, he plays with the turn to tickle it to fine leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Chase, 1 run

items.text: given some air outside off, slightly full, he comes forward to clip it to mid-on's right and they take a quick single
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, 1 run

items.text: drags it down short, and he goes back to flick it to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Chase, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on a good length, Hope shows the full face of the bat while tapping it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, no run

items.preText: Syed Kabir: "Shimron Hetmyer has disappointed in the ODIs. Bangladesh have handled him extremely well. He smashed India in India but here he has become Mehidy's bunny. "
items.text: fuller outside off, driven to extra cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: off-cutter goes through the batsman and hits the helmet behind the keeper Chase was too slow to adjust to the shot, the ball goes between his bat and body, Mushfiqur dived to his right and got a glove, but the ball rolled off into the helmet. Five runs, much needed for West Indies
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, pushed to cover's left for a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on. Midwicket tumbles but lets it through and they get a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball, pushed to the off side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, he drives fluently by taking a big stride out but straight to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle and turning further down leg, he goes back to clip it towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, 2 runs
